messages.content: This was very helpful to me. Thanks for explaining it so well.
Thanks. Appreciate that perspective. I'm just saying it as a counter to the "rope is the only cope" mentality on the incel subreddit.
I will absolutely tell him this. Thank you. Congrats for making it out of the fog yourself.
thanks for the reply jzplayinggames, have a great weekend.
Interesting. I thought so too. I’m just thankful I have another parish I can easily drive to for mass. Thanks again
Ok, thank you and thanks for the LPT. Cold leftover food is great sometimes like cold pizza, cold meatballs, etc...
This was extremely helpful, many thanks!
Expected that. Thanks for your valuable feedback.
Thanks for your input into this discussion. It has been very productive.
Probably the most rational way to look at this entire scenario - thanks for posting this my dude. That comment set me straight again.
Thanks for giving advice to the people who need it 👌🙏
Thank you for writing this, for letting us into your world so that we can better understand our own. I am very grateful for this gift.
As someone from Louisiana I am always thankful for Mississippi and West Virginia for holding down the absolute bottom
I'm doing my best to apply that. Thank you for commenting
Adoration is definitely something I could do more of. Thank you!
Yes, thank [NAME] the wisest of [NAME] live outside your country
Thank you for your message, I read it when I woke up and it helped. Thank you for showing kindness to a stranger
That's really interesting. Thank you for the information. It's just hard to imagine lives you'll never live.
Thanks man, I managed to feel better by letting loose with some music - definitely a *much* better way to pull out of a dive.
Thanks for having that self awareness, as a physician in training I feel stupid daily. It's a very humbling job
Thanks for being here. :-) We can always use allies.
Good point, thank you for the correction
Contacted the hospital I was born at and I’m getting my birth certificate! Thanks for all the help this was a big step forward
Thanks for your comment. This makes sense with the time frames too.
Anyway, it's 00:33 am here at the moment, so I'm gonna head to bed. Thank you for reading and good night :)
Thanks for the reply! I’ll probably just smoke, as you said, once maybe twice a month. Thanks again!
